site_name: NATURAL HISTORY EDUCATION CO OF MIDSOUTH

citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:30am on
Tuesday Dec. 17, 2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee/registrant by phone and text. Licensee replied to
text that no one was available. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious
violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:30am on 
Tuesday Dec. 17, 2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee/registrant by phone and text. Licensee replied to 
text that no one was available. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious 
violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
